ygData.subject: Re: Treehuggers?
ygData.msgSnippet: ... that is what we have commonly been called.  However, I must point out that no Druid in the history of Norrath, as far as I have seen, follows the path of
ygData.messageBody:
>Ah, my dear barbarian woman. By "Tree-hugger", I assume you mean a Druid, as
that is what we have commonly been called. However, I must point out that no
Druid in the history of Norrath, as far as I have seen, follows the path of
Quellious The Tranquil....Annotated

Yes this is true but a Druid may follow the teaching of Quellious while still
staying in the order of their God. As long as their god does not require hate
or war.

From the current response I think that there is going to be a very heated debate.


Does anyone have any suggestions on how to keep a debate running smoothly?
Maybe call on people to talk. I don't want it to be so crazy that noone hears
what anyone says.
